name: Ghost Jump
description:
My first ever game has a familiar look to it I am sure, however I am happy with the outcome and look forward to taking what I have learnt from the development process of this game forward with me to create much better projects in the future. 

The artwork was created in Photoshop, making use of pixel art to create a night sky background, tube 'enemy' and a character that is represented as a ghost. I made use of the UE4 blueprint system in order to 'programme' my game. 

Credit to https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCORaUhZVpg7yhxJeaPSTGmQ for providing insight into Unreal Engine 4 blueprint system that was used in this project.
